questions.question_text:
A company is setting up a brand new datacenter and would like to keep the cabling infrastructure out of sight but still accessible to the network administrators.
Infrastructure cost is not an issue.
Which of the following should be installed to meet the requirements?
The BEST way to secure the most vulnerable attack vector for a network is to:

choices.B: Use biometrics and SSO for authentication.
choices.A: Update all antivirus definitions on workstations and servers.
choices.D: Provide end-user awareness training to office staff.
choices.C: Remove unneeded services running on the servers.

discussion.content: Running Route Print does not do anything for identifying the Process. Opening Task manager and looking up the PID found in the netstat results would identify the running service.

choices.B: Log into the DNS server every hour to check if the logs are full

questions.question_text:
Ann, a system administrator, is troubleshooting an issue with a DNS server. She notices that the security logs have filled up and that they need to be cleared from the event viewer. She recalls this being a daily occurrence.
Which of the following solutions would BEST resolve this problem?

discussion.content:
C is the correct answer. 

'Event management software is the generic term for a wide range of software products that are used in the management of professional and academic conferences, trade exhibitions, conventions and smaller events such as Continuing Professional Development meetings'

Google wiki if you want to dive deeper...

TACACS is not supported with 802.1x authentication. Until the client is authenticated, 802.1x access control allows only Extensible Authentication Protocol over LAN (EAPOL), Cisco Discovery Protocol (CDP), and Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) traffic through the port to which the client is connected.

questions.question_text: In a network that requires multilayer switches to use authentication via RADIUS/TACACS+, which of the following access control models will the switches need to utilize?
